author: chirino
msg: Converted to from scaml to jade templates since they are more concise.

author: chirino
msg: All configuration DTO fields are now reference fields and not defaulted to values.  This allows the XML to be written back out /w the same data it was load from.  The previous approach to defaulting data values was causing the written XML balloon with more data.

author: danielsh
msg: Add an input validation to the library to prevent assertions on

author: johnh
msg: Reinstate allowance for null values in ContainerConfig children to delete values from the parent.
